services.title: Our Distinguished Services
services.subtitle: We provide a comprehensive range of specialized services in interior and exterior design, urban planning, landscape design, brand development, and specialized consultations in various fields with international standards and exceptional quality

interiorDesign.title: Interior Design
interiorDesign.description: We transform interior design art into tangible reality that adds value and beauty to every space
details: Practical and elegant designs that reflect client identity
Careful selection of colors and lighting
Furniture arrangement for harmony and comfort
Transforming ideas into inspiring living experiences
interiorDesign.fullDescription: At our company, we transform interior design art into tangible reality that adds value and beauty to every space. We create practical and elegant designs that reflect our clients' identity and meet their needs precisely. We pay attention to the finest details from color and lighting selection to furniture arrangement to achieve harmony and comfort. Our goal is to transform every idea into an inspiring and integrated living experience.

exteriorDesign.title: Exterior Design
exteriorDesign.description: We design attractive exterior facades that reflect brand identity
exteriorDesign.fullDescription: We design attractive exterior facades that reflect brand identity and attract customers. We use the latest materials and technologies to ensure quality and sustainability. We care about harmony with the surrounding environment and energy efficiency improvement.

urbanPlanning.title: Urban Planning
urbanPlanning.description: We plan cities and communities in a sustainable and innovative way
urbanPlanning.fullDescription: We plan cities and communities in a sustainable and innovative way that considers current and future population needs. We focus on improving quality of life, environmental sustainability, and economic development.

landscapeDesign.title: Landscape Design
landscapeDesign.description: We design beautiful outdoor spaces that harmonize with the environment
landscapeDesign.fullDescription: We design beautiful outdoor spaces that harmonize with the natural environment. We focus on sustainability and improving quality of life through green spaces and innovative gardens.

brandDevelopment.title: Brand Development
brandDevelopment.description: We develop strong and distinctive visual identity for brands
brandDevelopment.fullDescription: We develop strong and distinctive visual identity for brands that helps them stand out in the market and build strong relationships with customers. We focus on creativity and innovation in every detail.

marketingConsulting.title: Marketing Consulting
marketingConsulting.description: We provide specialized marketing consultations for business growth
marketingConsulting.fullDescription: We provide specialized marketing consultations that help companies grow their business and increase sales. We focus on innovative strategies and practical solutions.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Tramuz Design & Consulting Company
about.description: Tramuz is a leading Saudi company specialized in design and consulting for restaurants, cafes, and commercial projects. The company was established to provide innovative and distinguished solutions that meet the needs of the growing Saudi market.
about.vision: To be the leading company in design and consulting in Saudi Arabia and the region, with focus on innovation, quality, and sustainability.
about.mission: Providing integrated and innovative design and consulting solutions that meet our clients' needs and help them achieve their business and investment goals.
about.goal: Developing distinguished projects that add real value to society and local economy, while maintaining the highest standards of quality and sustainability.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are a team of specialized engineers, designers, and consultants with extensive experience in various fields of design and consulting.

about.excellence: We are committed to the highest standards of quality and excellence in all our projects, with focus on innovation, sustainability, and complete customer satisfaction.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Tramuz is a leading and ambitious company in the design and consulting sector, specialized in interior and exterior design, urban planning, landscape design, and brand development. Tramuz started from Riyadh and its reputation spread throughout the Kingdom until it achieved successes and built distinguished relationships with its clients.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Creating innovative spaces that inspire and transform communities

stories.title: Al-Asalah Restaurant - Inspiring Success Story
stories.description: We helped Al-Asalah Restaurant increase its sales by 150% through innovative interior design and effective marketing strategy.

stories.title: Al-Nakheel Cafe - Radical Transformation
stories.description: We developed a new visual identity for Al-Nakheel Cafe that helped it stand out in the market and attract new customers.

testimonials.name: Ahmed Mohammed
testimonials.content: Our experience with Tramuz company was exceptional. They helped us transform our restaurant into a distinguished destination in Riyadh. The design and supervision were at the highest level.

testimonials.name: Fatima Al-Saeed
testimonials.content: Tramuz team is very professional. They helped us develop our visual identity and significantly increase our customer base. I recommend working with them.

testimonials.name: Khalid Al-Otaibi
testimonials.content: Tramuz company is distinguished by creativity and quality. They helped us develop our residential and commercial projects. We look forward to cooperating with them in future projects.
